name: VehicleRecallsCanada
0:
”Alexa, search vehicle recalls for Pontiac Firebird”
”Alexa, open vehicle recalls”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: vehicle recalls
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Vehicle Recalls Canada provides a quick and easy way to search for passenger vehicle and light truck recalls. Just provide the make, model, and year of the vehicle and you’ll get information straight from the Transport Canada Motor Vehicle Safety Recalls Database. If you have a phone number associated with your Alexa account, you can receive recall information by text message. 

Disclaimer: The content may be changed without notice and is not guaranteed to be complete, correct, timely, current or up-to-date. Always confirm on the Transport Canada Motor Vehicle Safety Recalls Database if you suspect a recall has been issued. If a recall is listed, you can call the manufacturer, a local dealer, or visit the manufacturer’s website to check on the status of the recall. 

Feedback: automobile@tc.gc.ca

Vehicle Recalls Canada is an open source project! Check out our work on GitHub: https://github.com/tc-ca/alexa-gc-recalls

Stay informed about recalls of vehicles, tires and child car seats: https://www.tc.gc.ca/en/services/road/defects-recalls-vehicles-tires-child-car-seats/stay-informed.html
